progression.title: Kill Hillock
progression.description: Navigate through The Twilight Strand until you encounter Hillock. Kill him and enter town for your reward.

progression.title: Equip movespeed boots
progression.description: Equip movement speed boots for faster leveling. If you do not have any in your stash, you can look to purchase some from Tarkleigh.

progression.title: Go to The Coast
progression.description: Enter The Coast, run through any mobs and continue until you tag the waypoint.

progression.title: Grab a quicksilver flask
progression.description: Enter The Tidal Island to the right of the Coast waypoint. Travel around the left side until you find Hailrake. Kill him to get the Medicine Chest and portal back to town to get your quicksilver flask reward from Nessa.

progression.title: Break some eggs
progression.description: Enter The Mud Flats and pick up the three glyphs from the Rhoa nests. Touch the wall next to Nessa and make your way to The Submerged Passage.

progression.title: To The Ledge!
progression.description: Enter The Submerged Passage and look for the bridge. Place a portal here to come back later for the sidequest and a skllpoint. Then continue over the bridge and on to The Ledge.

progression.title: Find the tiny crab
progression.description: Find the waypoint in The Ledge, then take the waypoint back to town and return to the submerged passage portal you left and seach for The Flooded Depths.

progression.title: Kill the tiny crab
progression.description: Navigate through the zone to find The Deep Dweller. Kill it to finish the quest, then portal back to town to recieve your reward, a skill point.

progression.title: Proceed to The Climb
progression.description: From the waypoint in The Ledge, continue onwards to the next zone: The Climb.

progression.title: Continue to The Lower Prison
progression.description: Continue through The Climb killing the unique boss The Faun, if you have not already, to unlock the NPC Navalli. Then enter the Lower Prison.

progression.title: Move up in the Prison
progression.description: Continue through the zone and enter The Upper Prison.

progression.title: Complete the trial of ascendency (L1)
progression.description: Complete the trial of ascendency in The Lower Prison.

progression.title: Continue to The Warden's Chambers and Kill Brutus
progression.description: Make your way through the zone and enter The Warden's Chambers. Kill Brutus, enter Prisoner's Gate then take the waypoint back to town to recieve your rewards.

progression.title: Go to The Ship Graveyard
progression.description: Continue through the prisoner's gate to The Ship Graveyard.

progression.title: Find The Ship Graveyard Cave
progression.description: Find The Ship Graveyard Cave so you can obtain the Allflame to bring back to Fairgraves and recieve a skill point for your quest.

progression.title: Find the Allflame
progression.description: Find the Allflame at the end of the cave and bring it to Fairgraves to complete the quest.

progression.title: Find The Cavern of Wrath
progression.description: Continue through The Ship Graveyard to find The Cavern of Wrath.

progression.title: Find the Cavern of Anger and Kill Merveil
progression.description: Continue through The Cavern of Anger until you find Merveil's lair. Kill Merveil and proceed to Act 2.

progression.title: Find the Act 2 Town
progression.description: Find The Forest Encampment through The Southern Forest.

progression.title: To the Right
progression.description: Enter The Old Fields from town. From this path you will find Kraityn, The Chamber of Sins, and The Crypt.

progression.title: To the Left
progression.description: Enter The Western Forest. From here you will find Alira, Oak, and the Ancient Pyramind.

progression.title: Find The Crossroads
progression.description: Mode through The Old Fields and enter The Crossroads.

progression.title: Enter The Chamber of Sins
progression.description: From The Crossroads waypoint, head up and to the left to find the Chamber of Sins.

progression.title: Continue through the Chamber
progression.description: Find the waypoint in the middle of The Chamber of Sins Level 1, then continue onwards to The Chamber of Sins Level 2.

progression.title: Complete the trial of ascendency (L2)
progression.description: Complete the trial of ascendency in The Chamber of Sins Level 2.

progression.title: Obtain the Baleful Gem
progression.description: Find and Kill Fidelitas to obtain the Baleful Gem. One piece needed to gain access to The Vaal Ruins.

progression.title: Find Krailyn in The Broken Bridge
progression.description: Take the waypoint back to The Crossroads and go up and to the right to find The Broken Bridge where you will find Krailyn, one of the bandits.

progression.title: Find The Western Forest and Alira
progression.description: From the waypoint in The Riverways, go left to find the entrace to The Western Forest. Here you will find Alira, one of the Bandits.

progression.title: Kill the Blackguards
progression.description: Keeping navigating downwards until you find the Blackguards. Kill them, pick up the Thaumetic Emblem, place the emblem into the wall at the bottom of the zone to complete the quest. You must return to Lioneye's Watch in Act 1 to recieve your reward.

progression.title: Find The Weaver's Chambers
progression.description: Opposite Alira will be the entrace to The Weaver's Chambers. As you get closer, trees will be covered in webs.

progression.title: Defeat The Weaver
progression.description: Move through The Weaver's Chambers until you find The Weaver's Nest. Enter and kill The Weaver to recieve Maligaro's Spike. You will need this Spike to enter The Vaal Ruins.

progression.title: Find The Wetlands and Oak
progression.description: From The Riverways waypoint, move upwards until you find The Wetlands. Here you will encounter Oak, one of the bandits, in the center of the zone.

progression.title: Enter The Vaal Ruins
progression.description: Find the waypoint in The Wetlands and use Maligaro's Spike and The Baleful Gem to break the roots nearby, granting you access to The Vaal Ruins.

progression.title: Break the seal, Enter the Northern Forest
progression.description: Move through The Vaal Ruins until you find The Ancient Seal. Break the seal and continue onwards to The Northern Forest.

progression.title: Find The Caverns
progression.description: Once you have entered The Northern Forest, continue up the river to find The Caverns.

progression.title: Find The Ancient Pyramind
progression.description: Continue through the zone until you find the entrance to The Ancient Pyramind.

progression.title: Kill The Vaal Oversoul
progression.description: Reach the Pyramind Apex and active the Dark Altar to unlease The Vaal Oversoul. Kill it to obtain the entrance to Act 3.

progression.title: Talk with Clarissa and enter town
progression.description: Defeat the guards and talk with Clarissa before continuing on to town.

progression.title: Enter the Slums
progression.description: Once in town, enter The Slums at the top right to continue your journey.

progression.title: Locate the Sewer and find The Crematorium
progression.description: Make sure to find the Sewer, as you will need to enter this at a later point, then continue to The Crematorium.

progression.title: Complete the trial of ascendency (L3)
progression.description: Complete the trial of ascendency in The Crematorium.

progression.title: Defeat Piety and her guards
progression.description: Defeat Piety in the Crematorium to obtain Tolman's Bracelet. Bring this back to Clarissa to gain obtain the keys to the Sewer. Return back to The Slums where you can now enter The Sewers.

progression.title: Obtain the busts and continue to The Marketplace
progression.description: Find all three stashes which contain platinum busts. Once you have found all three you can return to town for a skill point. Continue onwards to The Marketplace.

progression.title: Find The Battlefront
progression.description: Make your way through The Marketplace until you find The Battlefront.

progression.title: Grab the Ribbon Spool and head to The Docks
progression.description: Find the Ribbon Spool next to the waypoint in The Battlefront. Once you have that, make your way to The Docks.

progression.title: Obtain the Thaumetic Sulphite
progression.description: Enter The Docks and look for the Thaumetic Sulphite. Once you find this, take it to Dialla in The Solaris Temple to obtain the Infernal Talc.

progression.title: Move to The Solaris Temple
progression.description: After finding the Thaumetic Sulphite in The Docks. Head to The Solaris Temple where you will find Dialla.

progression.title: Find Lady Dialla
progression.description: Proceed to The Solaris Temple Level 2 where you will find Lady Dialla. Talk to her to recieve the Infernal Talc in exchange for the Ribbon Spool and the Thaumetic Sulphite. Use this to clear the blockage in The Sewers and proceed to The Ebony Barracks.

progression.title: Kill Gravicius and move to The Lunaris Temple
progression.description: Take the staircases upwards until you find Gravicius. Kill him to complete a quest then continue upwards to The Lunaris Temple.

progression.title: Continue till you find and kill Piety. Then go to The Imperial Gardens
progression.description: Continue downards to The Lunaris Temple Level 2. Navigate through until you find an orange portal leading to Piety. Kill her to obtain the Tower Key. After this, proceed to The Imperial Gardens.

progression.title: Complete the trial of ascendency (L4)
progression.description: Complete the trial of ascendency in The Imperial Gardens.

progression.title: Find The Sceptre of God
progression.description: Navigate through The Imperial Gardens until you find The Sceptre of God. Use the Tower Key you obtained from killing Pierty to gain access.

progression.title: Enter the Imperial Gardens
progression.description: Enter the Imperial Gardens.

progression.title: Continue to The Upper Sceptre of God
progression.description: Make your way up various staircases until you find The Upper Sceptre of God.

progression.title: Find and Kill Dominus
progression.description: Ascend up more staircases until you find The Tower Rooftop. Here you will fight Dominus. Kill him to proceed to Act 4.

progression.title: Find the Act 4 town
progression.description: Continue through The Aqueducts until you reach Highgate.

progression.title: Enter the Dried Lake
progression.description: Enter The Dried Lake at the bottom left of the town to find Deshret's Banner which will unlock the mines.

progression.title: Obtain Deshret's Banner and enter The Mines
progression.description: Kill Voll to obtain Deshre't Banner to open the entrance to the mines.

progression.title: Proceed deeper into the mine
progression.description: Continue through the first level of the mines until you reach the second level.

progression.title: Find Deshret's spirit and The Crystal Veins
progression.description: Continue through the second level of The Mines. Here you will want to free Deshret's spirit for a skill point. Then continue to The Crystal Veins

progression.title: Find Lady Dialla and enter Daresso's Dream
progression.description: After meeting Dialla, enter Daresso's Dream to the right.

progression.title: Find Lady Dialla and enter Kaom's Dream
progression.description: After meeting Dialla, enter Kaom's Dream to the right.

progression.title: Proceed to The Grand Arena
progression.description: Fight through enemies until you find The Grand Arena.

progression.title: Kill Daresso in The Ring of Blades
progression.description: Proceed through the arena until you find Daresso. Kill him to obtain The Eye of Desire. Bring this back to Dialla.

progression.title: Proceed to Kaom's Stronghold
progression.description: Make your way through to Kaom's Stronghold.

progression.title: Kill Kaom in The Caldera of The King
progression.description: Proceed through the arena until you find Kaom. Kill him to obtain The Eye of Fury. Bring this back to Dialla.

progression.title: Enter The Belly of The Beast
progression.completionTrigger: area|the belly of the beast level 1
progression.description: Take both eyes back to Dialla and she will open the entrance to The Belly of The Beast.

progression.title: Proceed to Level 2
progression.completionTrigger: area|the belly of the beast level 2
progression.description: Continue through the Belly of The Beast until you reach the second level.

progression.title: Kill Piety and proceed to The Harvest
progression.description: Continue through The Belly of The Beast Level 2 until you reach Piety. Kill her then continue to The Harvest.

progression.title: Defeat Malachai to obtain access to The Ascent
progression.description: Obtain the the organs in The Harvest by killing Doedre, Maligaro, and Shavronne. Then make your way to The Black Core where you will fight Malachai.

progression.title: Proceed to Act 5
progression.description: Once you have defeated Malachai. Portal back to town and enter The Ascent. Continue through until you find a portal to Oriath.

progression.title: Find the Act 5 town
progression.description: Continue through The Slave Pens. Kill Overseer Krow to gain access to the town.

progression.title: Enter The Control Blocks
progression.description: After talking with Vendors for quest rewards, continue to The Control Blocks.

progression.title: Find the Miasmeter and continue to Oriath Square
progression.description: Find the Miasmeter, then continue until you find Justicar Casticus. Kill him then continue to Oriath Square.

progression.title: Find The Templar Courts
progression.description: Navigate through the Oriath Square until you find The Templar Courts.

progression.title: Proceed to The Chamber of Innocence
progression.description: Move through The Templar Courts until you find The Chamber of Innocence.

progression.title: Kill Innocence and proceed to The Torched Courts
progression.description: Find and kill Innocence, then proceed out of The Chamber of Innocnence and into The Torched Courts.

progression.title: Return back to The Ruined Square
progression.description: Make your way through The Torched Courts until you find your way back to the Ruined Square.

progression.title: Complete the trial of ascendency (L5)
progression.description: Complete the trial of ascendency in The Catacombs.

progression.title: Complete the trial of ascendency (L6)
progression.description: Complete the trial of ascendency in The Crypt.

progression.title: Complete your first lab
progression.description: Go to The Aspirant's plaza from the Act 3 town and complete the Labryinth to ascend.

progression.title: Enter The Ossuary
progression.description: Find the entrance to The Ossuary next to the waypoint in The Ruined Square.

progression.title: Obtain the Sign of Purity
progression.description: In the Ossuary obtain The Sign of Purity as the center. You will need this to fight Kitava.

progression.title: Find The Reliquary
progression.description: Find The Reliquary from The Ruined Square.

progression.title: Find Kitava's Torments
progression.description: Search The Reliquary for Kitava's Torments. Collect them all for a reward back in town.

progression.title: Head to The Cathedral Rooftop
progression.description: Find the Cathedral Rooftop from The Ruined Square where you will meet Kitava.

progression.title: Kill Kitava and proceed to Act 6
progression.description: Make your way to the Cathedral Apex where you will fight Kitava. Kill Kitava in order to gain access to the act 6 town.

progression.title: Proceed to The Coast
progression.description: Enter The Coast from Lioneye's Watch to begin Act 6.

progression.title: Proceed to The Mud Flats
progression.description: Grab the waypoint at the end of The Coast and enter The Mud Flats

progression.title: Enter The Karui Fortress
progression.description: First kill The Dishonored Queen to obtain the Eye of Conquest. Take this and use it to access the gate to The Karui Fortress.

progression.title: Defeat Tukohama and proceed to The Ridge
progression.description: Defeat Tukohama in Tukohama's Keep to the right of the zone entrance. Then continue onwards to The Ridge.

progression.title: Find The Lower Prison
progression.description: Navigate through The Ridge to The Lower Prison.

progression.title: Complete the trial of ascendency (C1)
progression.description: Complete the trial of ascendency for Cruel Lab in The Lower Prison.

progression.title: Continue to Shavronne's Tower
progression.description: Continue through The Lower Prison to Shavronne's Tower.

progression.title: Kill Shavronne to access The Prisoner's Gate
progression.description: Make your way to The Prison Rooftop. Here you will encounted Brutus and Shavronne. Kill them both to obtain access to The Prisoner's Gate.

progression.title: Kill Abberath an Proceed to The Western Forest
progression.description: Find the Valley of The Fire Drinker where you will fight Abberath. Kill him to recieve a skill point. Then continue onwards to The Western Forest.

progression.title: Proceed to The Riverways
progression.description: Follow the path until you find The Riverways.

progression.title: Continue to The Southern Forest
progression.description: Find the waypoint then continue to The Southern Forest.

progression.title: Proceed to The Wetlands
progression.description: Find The Wetlands where you can kill Ryslatha for a skill point.

progression.title: Kill The Puppet Mistress
progression.description: Find and kill The Puppet Mistress, Ryslatha, then make your way back to town to recieve your reward.

progression.title: Find The Cavern of Anger
progression.description: Proceed dowwards through The Southern Forest to find The Cavern of Anger.

progression.title: Proceed to The Beacon with The Black Flag
progression.description: Take the Black Flag and continue through the Passage to The Beacon.

progression.title: Light the Beacon and sail to The Brine King's Reef
progression.description: Make your way to the beacon where you will need to escort totems to their place under the beacon. Then light the beacon and talk with Weylam to sail to The Brine King's Reef.

progression.title: Kill The Brine King
progression.description: Find The Brine King's Throne and kill The Brine King. Then sail to Act 7.

progression.title: Go to The Broken Bridge
progression.description: Move through town to enter The Broken Bridge.

progression.title: Find The Crossroads
progression.description: Go left through The Broken Bridge until you find The Crossroads.

progression.title: Head to The Fellshrine Ruins
progression.description: Once you reach the waypoint in The Crossroads, head downwards to The Fellshrine Ruins.

progression.title: Find The Crypt
progression.description: Make your way downwards through the zone until you find The Crypt.

progression.title: Complete the trial of ascendency (C2)
progression.description: Complete the trial of ascendency for Cruel lab in The Crypt.

progression.title: Find Maligaro's Map
progression.description: Proceed to the second level of The Crypt where you will need to find Maligaro's Map. Take it and return to The Crossroads.

progression.title: Enter The Chamber of Sins
progression.description: From the waypoint in The Crossroads, move upwards until you find The Chamber of Sins.

progression.title: Enter Maligaro's Sanctum
progression.description: Go to the center of The Chamber of Sins where you can place Maligaro's Map that you found in The Crypt into the map device. This will open a portal to Maligaro's Sanctum.

progression.title: Kill Maligaro and talk to Sin
progression.description: Move through Maligaro's Sanctum until you find Maligaro, The Artist. Kill him to obtain the Black Venom which you can give to Sin. Once you have done this, he will give you an Obsidian Key you can use to access The Chamber of Sins Level 2.

progression.title: Complete the trial of ascendency (C3)
progression.description: Complete the trial of ascendency for Cruel lab in The Chamber of Sins Level 2.

progression.title: Find the secret passage to The Den
progression.description: Navigate through the zone going to the top right until you find The Secret Passage. Use the key Silk gave you to access The Den.

progression.title: Find The Ashen Fields
progression.description: Continue until you find The Ashen Fields entrance.

progression.title: Kill Greust and enter The Northern Forest
progression.description: Continue through The Ashen Fields until you find The Forest Encampment. Here you will need to Kill Greust to proceed to The Northern Forest.

progression.title: Find The Dread Thicket
progression.description: Find The Dread Thicket in The Northern Forest.

progression.title: Collect Fireflies and Kill Gruthkul
progression.description: Collect the fireflies for Yeena and kill Gruthkul in The Den of Despair to recieve a skill point.

progression.title: Find The Causeway
progression.description: Follow the right of the zone to the top to find the entrace to The Causeway.

progression.title: Grab Kishara's Star and continue to The Vaal City
progression.description: Move through the zone until you find a box containing Kishara's Star. Grab it, and continue to The Vaal City.

progression.title: Talk to Yeena and enter The Temple of Decay
progression.description: Find Yeena and deliver the fireflies you collected to gain access to The Temple of Decay.

progression.title: Continue to The Temple of Decay Level 2
progression.description: Continue downards to The Temple of Decay Level 2.

progression.title: Kill Arakaali and proceed to Act 8
progression.description: Find Arakaali's Web and kill Arakaali to gain access to The Sarn Ramparts.

progression.title: Find the Act 8 town
progression.description: Continue till you find The Sarn Encampment.

progression.title: Complete Cruel Lab
progression.description: Complete Cruel Lab.

progression.title: Enter The Toxic Conduits
progression.description: Find the entrance to The Toxic Conduits from town.

progression.title: Find Doedre's Cesspool
progression.description: Find the entrance to Doedre's Cesspool.

progression.title: Kill Doedre
progression.description: Find and Kill Doedre to gain access to The Grand Promenade.

progression.title: Find The Bath House
progression.description: Move to the left of the waypoint to find the entrace to The Bath House.

progression.title: Complete the trial of ascendency (M1)
progression.description: Complete the trial of ascendency for Merciless lab in The Bath House.

progression.title: Kill Hector and proceed to The Lunaris Concourse
progression.description: Kill Hector and grab the Wings of Vestiri from his chest. Then proceed to The Lunaris Concourse.

progression.title: Enter The High Gardens
progression.description: Find and enter The High Gardens where you can kill Yugul for a skill point.

progression.title: Kill Yugul
progression.description: Make your way through The High Gardens and enter The Pools of Terror. There you can kill Yugul to obtain a skill point.

progression.title: Find The Lunaris Temple
progression.description: Move through The Lunaris Concourse until you find the entrance to The Lunaris Temple.

progression.title: Proceed to The Lunaris Temple Level 2
progression.description: Find the waypoint and proceed to The Lunaris Temple Level 2.

progression.title: Kill Dusk, Harbinger of Lunaris
progression.description: Make your way through The Lunaris Temple until you find a portal. Here you will encounter Dusk. Kill Dusk and pick up The Moon Orb.

progression.title: Find The Quay
progression.description: Move to the right of the waypoint to find the entrance to The Quay.

progression.title: Help Clarissa and Proceed to The Grain Gate
progression.description: First find the Ankh of Eternity. Next bring it to Clarissa where you will have to kill Tolman. Once you have killed Tolman, continue through the zone until you reach The Grain Gate.

progression.title: Kill The Gemling Legion and proceed to The Imperial Fields
progression.description: Find the Gemling Legion, who you can kill for a skill point. Then continue to

progression.title: Find The Solaris Temple
progression.description: Move through The Imperial Fields until you find the entrance to The Lunaris Temple.

progression.title: Proceed to The Solaris Temple Level 2
progression.description: Continue upwards and to the right through the zone until you find The Solaris Temple Level 2.

progression.title: Kill Dawn, Harbinger of Solaris
progression.description: Make your way through The Lunaris Temple until you find a portal. Here you will encounter Dawn. Kill Dawn and pick up The Sun Orb.

progression.title: Proceed to The Harbour Bridge
progression.description: Proceed from either The Lunaris Concourse or The Solaris Concourse and continue till you find The Harbour Bridge.

progression.title: Kill Lunaris and Solaris
progression.description: Find The Sky Shrine in the middle of The Harbour Bridge. There place the Sun Orb and Moon Orb in the Statue of The Sisters. Then Kill the sisters and proceed to The Blood Aqueduct.

progression.title: Find the Act 9 Town
progression.description: Continue through The Blood Acqueduct until you find Highgate.

progression.title: Enter The Descent
progression.description: Go to the top right of Highgate and enter The Descent.

progression.title: Find the Vastiri Desert
progression.description: Continue down The Descent until you find The Vastiri Desert

progression.title: Proceed to The Foothills
progression.description: Move to the top left of the zone from the waypoint to find The Foothills.

progression.title: Clear the sandstorm
progression.description: Go to the top right of the Vastiri Desert where you will find a sandstorm blocking your way to the Oasis. Portal back to town and talk with Sin to recieve the quest. Then talk with Petarus and Vanja to recieve The Bottled Storm. Take that back to The Vastiri Desert to clear the way.

progression.title: Kill the dumb Scorpion
progression.description: Find The Sand Pit and kill Shakari, Queen of the Sands. Once she is killed, return to Highgate to recieve a skill point.

progression.title: Find The Boiling Lake
progression.description: From the waypoint, move right and enter The Boiling Lake.

progression.title: Kill The Basalisk and take the Acid
progression.description: Find and kill The Basalisk. Then pick up the Basalisk Acid to give to Sin later.

progression.title: Find The Tunnel
progression.description: Proceed left of the waypoint until you find the entrance to The Tunnel.

progression.title: Complete the trial of ascendency (M2)
progression.description: Complete the trial of ascendency for Merciless lab in The Tunnel.

progression.title: Find The Quarry
progression.description: Proceed through The Tunnel to The Quarry.

progression.title: Kill Garukhan and proceed to The Refinery
progression.description: Grab the waypoint in the middle of the zone, then continue to the bottom left where you will find the Shrine of The Winds. Kill Garukhan there to recieve a skill point, then head to the top left where you will find the entrance to The Refinery.

progression.title: Kill Gernal Adus and grab the powder
progression.description: Find General Adus, kill him, and take the Trarthan Powder back to Sin at the Quarry.

progression.title: Enter The Belly of The Beast
progression.description: Talk to Sin back at The Quary to gain access to The Belly of The Beast.

progression.title: Enter The Rotting Core
progression.description: Find the entrance to The Rotting Core.

progression.title: Kill The Depraved Trinity and proceed to Act 10
progression.description: Find The Black Heart and talk to Sin. Then kill the three spirits of Shavronne, Maligaro, and Doedre. Finally kill the Depraved Trinity and talk to Lilly to sail back to Oriath and begin Act 10.

progression.title: Go to The Cathedral Rooftop
progression.description: Make your way through town to The Cathedral Rooftop.

progression.title: Talk to Bannon and continue to The Ravaged Square
progression.description: When you first enter The Cathedral Rooftop, go left and kill of guards and talk to Bannon. Then continue to the right until you find The Ravaged Square.

progression.title: Proceed to Torched Courts
progression.description: Moved upwards and to the right to find The Torched Courts.

progression.title: Find The Desecrated Chambers
progression.description: Proceed through The Torched Courts until you find The Desecrated Chambers.

progression.title: Kill Avarius, Reassembled
progression.description: Make your way to the Sanctum of Innocence and kill Avarius, Reassembled. Then make your way back to The Ravaged Square.

progression.title: Find The Control Blocks
progression.description: Find The Control Blocks at the bottom of The Ravaged Square.

progression.title: Kill Vilenta
progression.description: Find the arena and kill Vilenta, then make your way back to town for a skill point.

progression.title: Complete the trial of ascendency (M3)
progression.description: Complete the trial of ascendency for Merciless lab in The Ossuary.

progression.title: Enter The Ossuary to find the trial of ascendency
progression.description: Enter The Ossuary to find the last trial of ascendency for Meriless lab.

progression.title: Enter The Canals
progression.description: Next to the waypoint in The Ravaged Square, talk to Innocence and enter The Canals.

progression.title: Proceed to The Feeding Trough
progression.description: Continue through till you find The Feeding Trough

progression.title: Kill Kitava
progression.description: Make your way to the end of The Feeding Trough where you will find Sin and Innocence. Enter the Arena and Kill Kitava. Then proceed to Oriath to begin the end game.

progression.title: Complete Merciless Lab
progression.description: Complete your Merciless Lab
